rating.title: Wonderful

rating.title: Overall nice place to live

rating.title: Nice place to live
rating.description: We lived in this apartment for one year (Jan-Dec 2007). We moved out only because we bought a new house. When the ownership changed in mid-year all around quality suffered a bit. However the new management and maintenance staff became very responsive in no time. We enjoyed our unit. One

rating.title: Can we get on one track and stay with it!

rating.title: i am renewing

rating.title: Everything changed

rating.title: GREAT apartments! The best in Allen/Plano/Frisco area!!!!
rating.description: I have lived at these apartments for 6 months and I don't have even one single complaint (and I'm a seasoned renter and have seen it all). The staff is wonderful and polite. The location is beautiful and quite. I haven't ever heard any noises from any of our neighbors

rating.title: I will miss my apartment

rating.title: Great staff

rating.title: you will love it
rating.description: I must say, compared to my past experience with apartments, this one has been my best experience. The staff is friendly, informative, and they actually listen to my complaints. The grounds are beutiful, never any trash around. Maintence men are polite and get the job done fast. Parking is ok,

rating.title: Above the rest at least
rating.description: These are some very nice apartments. They are a little overpriced. rating.title: can a current resident email me?
rating.description: I have some questions and would like to talk to a current resident. Can someone email me at ethanusa@gmail.com? Thanks!

rating.title: Enjoyed living here
rating.description: Lived here for 14 months and have enjoyed it. Staff is very friendly and responsive. Love the pool area. Lots of kids starting to move it and I live close to the pool so it's a bit loud but other than that, it's been wonderful. Beautiful interiors.

rating.title: GREAT PLACE!

rating.title: above the rest-YES!

rating.title: i like it here
rating.description: nice quiet place, great view of trees, friendly staff, and many great resident functions like saturday morning brunches and vendor days. i would reccommend living here.

rating.title: I LOVE living here
rating.description: I really love living here! I have been apartment living for almost 5 years and have never experienced a more beautiful apartment. rating.title: Not worth the money.

rating.title: Awesome!
rating.description: Move here, you will not regret it. My apartment feels like a custom home. Lots of upgrades and and the staff is awesome.

rating.title: Parking
rating.description: IT SUCKS I HAVE TO PARK IN FIRE LANES OR WALK 4 BUILDINGS TO GET HOME

rating.title: Great Place to Live
rating.description: Aubery is new and the apartments are beautiful but what is great about this community is the staff. They seem to be well organized and friendly. The activities they offer for the residents say alot about how the Management/Owner cares. It's not all about the budget. The grounds are immaculate

rating.title: great experience...
rating.description: I moved here from another city not really knowing anyone and I have never felt so welcomed. The girls in the office have been great!
